overview: As we peek in on young, college-aged men struggling to face - and embrace - their true sexuality. Michael Delray finds himself turned on while taking care of injured football buddy Ian Levine, and the two give in to their lustful desires while Ian is laid up in bed. Sexy closeted Trent Ferris refuses to be seen in public with openly gay boyfriend Billie Ramos, but meanwhile Trent puts the moves on vulnerable young Ian, seducing the baby-faced teen during a study session. Finally, engaged straight boy Michael Delray confesses his confusion to gorgeous secret lover Brandon Wilde.
title: In the Closet 3
